english.segment1: Could someone help me comprehend. How my wanting to have friends. Is now this monster that I feed. It's popularity I need. When people think that I'm the deal. It helps me feel like I am real. But I think I lost the me. Looking for the star machine
english.segment2: I don't want any part of it. Everything is here today gone tomorrow. Big star machine. Ricky martin or menudo. Big star machine. VHl "where are they?". Follows big star machine. How could I have been so shallow. Big big star machine
english.segment3: Could someone help me comprehend. How I came to judge my friends. On a scale of trendiness. And somehow I love them less. Not as hip as they could be. Through the eyes of star machine. It's a dumb philosophy. To judge by popularity. I don't want any part of it everything is
english.segment4: Here today gone tomorrow. Big star machine. Ricky martin or menudo. Big star machine. VHl "where are they?". Follows big star machine. How could I have been so shallow. Big big star machine
